abstract: The chief for the home improvement chain will try to make up for past mistakes by laying out his vision for the future at its annual meeting Wednesday.
snippet: The chief for the home improvement chain will try to make up for past mistakes by laying out his vision for the future at its annual meeting Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: It was, as even Home Depot executives will concede, a 37-minute fiasco.

headline.main: Home Depot to Investors: Mea Culpa
headline.print_headline: Home Depot To Investors: Mea Culpa

abstract: It was, as even Home Depot executives will concede, a 37-minute fiasco. In a basement hotel ballroom in Delaware, with the board nowhere in sight and huge timers on stage to cut off angry investors, Home Depot held a hasty annual meeting last year that attendees alternately described as “appalling” and “arrogant.”
lead_paragraph: It was, as even Home Depot executives will concede, a 37-minute fiasco. In a basement hotel ballroom in Delaware, with the board nowhere in sight and huge timers on stage to cut off angry investors, Home Depot held a hasty annual meeting last year that attendees alternately described as “appalling” and “arrogant.”

headline.main: Home Depot Plans Kinder, Gentler Shareholder Meeting
